    555-1234 | john.doe@email.com

}

  Google \\
  \par

  Dear Hiring Manager,
  \par

}

% Body Section Content
\def\BodyContent{%
  \noindent
  I am writing to express my strong interest in the Software Engineer position at Google. With a proven track record in full-stack development, cloud-native architecture, and a passion for building scalable systems, I am excited about the opportunity to contribute to your team.
  \par
  \vspace{8pt}
  
  \noindent
  Over the past 5 years, I have developed expertise in React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL, building web applications that serve millions of users. At my current role, I led the development of a microservices architecture that improved system performance by 40\% and reduced deployment time by 60\%.
  \par
  \vspace{8pt}
  
  \noindent
  Thank you for considering my application. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my skills and experience align with Google's needs. I look forward to hearing from you.
  \par
}
